title: How do I count glyphs in FontLab?
content: I'm interested in knowing how many glyphs are in a font. Is there an easy way to determine this in FL 4.6? Would it be different in FL 5?
author: canderson

comments.content:
in the bottom right corner there's a set of numbers that looks like this:

S:N T:N, where S = Selected, T = Total, and N = some number
Thanks, I really should have been able to figure that out.
Ahh, that's simpler than my way. I put it into index mode, scroll to the bottom and look at the index of the last glyph.
